summary: CLUNKING/BANGING NOISE FELT IN STEERING WHEEL, GAS AND BRAKE PEDALS WHEN TURNING RIGHT OR LEFT AND SOMETIMES WHEN GOING STRAIGHT ON A ROUGH SURFACE.  TAKEN TO DEALER THREE TIMES FOR REPAIR. OWNER WAS TOLD THAT CAR WAS SAFE TO DRIVE IN THE MEANWHILE.  OWNER WAS TOLD THAT THERE WAS A BULLETIN REGARDING THIS ISSUE.  OWNER FILED A COMPLAINT WITH GM.  *NM
